descriptions.Barbarian: Use quick reflexes and strength to obliterate opponents
descriptions.Wizard: Cast Arcane Spells using your vast knowledge
descriptions.Bard: Play amazing songs using your trusty guitar to stun your enemies

text: As you come home after a long day of sleeping, eating, and being amazing, you notice something lurking in the shadows.
You find a police officer and return to your house, but your magical wishbone has been stolen.
The policeman has now left.
You died.
The mysterious person hisses, then says, 'I am the almighty Fuzzy McFuzzface, bow to my mightiness!'
img:fuzzy.png
The figure picks up a ball and throws it.
Despite all your will power, you are unable to resist the urge to go get it.
Once you return, you realize your magical wishbone has been stolen.
In the shadows, a little ball starts squeaking.
As you move closer, you realize that the magical wishbone has left a trail of magical power.
That has caused inanimate objects to become evil.
Everyone hates you for the rest of your life.
You die old, friendless, and unaccomplished at the age of 13.
img:rip.png
You politely ask the ball to leave.
The ball does not like that. It attacks!
You follow the magical trail through a forest.
On the right, you notice a snake.
But something is familiar about it... it's made out of rope???
You ignore the snake and continue walking.
It hisses softly as you pass, and strikes!
Everyone hates you for the rest of your life.
You die old, friendless, and unaccomplished at the age of 13.
img:rip.png
RIP
You find a clearing where the magical energy pulses stronger.
The trail continues deeper into the woods...
After defeating the mighty rope snake, you continue your adventure through the jungle.
You hear something behind you.
A tiger is stalking you, but something is unusual about it.
It has gashes across its whole body, its eyes are gouged out, and its blood is… white?
"You will pay for what you have done to my kind," the voice rasped, shouting at the… tree?
"Of course I'm talking to you, jerk," the tiger-tree snaps.
"That's what they all say," the voice growls.
"You tortured me viciously for your own entertainment, but now I shall have my revenge."
"DIEEEEE!" the tiger roars as it lunges forward!
Everyone hates you for the rest of your life.
You die old, friendless, and unaccomplished at the age of 13.
img:rip.png
The tiger evaporates into glowing mist as the cursed jungle fades.
You stand alone, breathing heavy, with one thought echoing in your head...
"What *did* I do to those tigers?"
As you continue your travels, you reach a hut in the woods, what would you like to do?

4.2.prompt: What do you want to do?

4.2'.prompt: What do you want to do?

4.2''.prompt: What do you want to do?

4.2'''.prompt: What do you want to do?

text: The path seems to warp around the hut, you are unable to leave the area.
The path seems to warp around the hut, you are unable to leave the area.
You attempt to use some match sticks, but your paws aren’t adept at setting things on fire.
You accidentally burn yourself repeatedly.
You attempt to use some match sticks, but your paws aren’t adept at setting things on fire.
You accidentally burn yourself repeatedly.
As you enter the hut, you see a bird sitting in a corner surrounded by squirrels.
The bird introduces himself as Cornelius and offers to help you.

4.6.prompt: What do you want to do?

text: Cornelius replies, 'I graduated top of my class at the School for Young Birds Who Would Like to Spend Their Whole Life Living in a Forest with Squirrels Until Someone Comes Along and Needs Their Help for 2 Hours.'

4.9.prompt: What do you want to do?

text.with: Why do you want to know?
Just trust me. You should accept my offer.

4.9''.prompt: What do you want to do?

text: The squirrels are defeated.
Cornelius congratulates you on your victory and gives you a token of his gratitude.
After much effort, you finally track down the vile Fuzzy McFuzzface.

5.2.prompt: What do you want to do?

text: "NEVER!!" he yells, and attacks you.
You challenge Fuzzy McFuzzface to a fight with no rules. He accepts with a smirk.
After defeating Fuzzy McFuzzface, you stand victorious.
A huge explosion erupts as Fuzzy's final words echo through the air, 'AUR NAUR!'
After a lot of hard work, you have finally beaten Fuzzy McFuzzface, and everyone would like you to give a speech.
It works for a bit, but then the paparazzi mob you.
It works for a bit, but then the paparazzi mob you.
You unfortunately can’t hide your breathing and they find out you are faking it.
You unfortunately can’t hide your breathing and they find out you are faking it.
Congratulations on your victory, you’ve triumphed over Fuzzy McFuzzface!
The student has become... not quite the master but better than the student. Think a TA.

CREDITS:
Programming: Vinayak Vikram
Story: Avinash Kumar, Angela Wang
Artwork: Jill Fulton
and most importantly, the most amazing, best, adorable dog in the world...
Breehy-hinny-brinny-hooey-hah! (or bree/breebo for short)
